abstract.text: Learn how to create custom Natural Language models for text classification and word tagging using multilingual, transformer-based embeddings. We‚Äôll show you how to train with less data and support up to 27 different languages across three scripts. Find out how to use these embeddings to fine-tune complex models trained in PyTorch and TensorFlow.

inlineContent.text: For more on Natural Language, check out ‚ÄúMake apps smarter with Natural Language‚Äù from WWDC20.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Make apps smarter with Natural Language

abstract.text: Explore how you can leverage the Natural Language framework to better analyze and understand text. Learn how to draw meaning from text using the framework‚Äôs built-in word and sentence embeddings, and how to create your own custom embeddings for specific needs.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Discover machine learning enhancements in Create ML

abstract.text: Find out how Create ML can help you do even more with machine learning models. Learn about the latest updates to image understanding and text-based tasks with multilingual BERT embeddings. Discover how easy it is to train models that can understand the content of images using multi-label classification. We‚Äôll also share information about interactive model evaluation and the latest APIs for custom training data augmentations.
